categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Salara was a fair-skinned Human female who served the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic as a Jedi Master during the Cold War and Galactic War with the Sith Empire. Garbed in the traditional dark brown robes of a Jedi Master and wielding a lightsaber, Salara was stationed on the Republic Navy's staging area of Carrick Station near the Deep Core alongside the Jedi Knight Briqui and Master Cassa Hun.

Salara first appeared in the BioWare–LucasArts video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released in 2011, where she is located on Carrick Station. She delivers an experience reward to Jedi Knight players in the mission "A Hero's Rest," at the end of Act I, and in the mission "Returning to the Fight" at the end of Act II.
